Package io.micronaut.cache.ehcache.configuration

Class EhcacheConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.cache.ehcache.configuration.EhcacheConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.micronaut.core.naming.Named
@EachProperty("ehcache.caches") public class EhcacheConfiguration extends Object implements io.micronaut.core.naming.Named
Configuration class for an Ehacahe-based cache.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
